title: Quick question about runterra lore
body: Do people from piltover and zaun believe supernatural people exist like will {{champion:245}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:51}}  believe that people like {{champion:136}} {{champion:432}} {{champion:120}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:83}} are real are do they feel that they're just fictional stories

replies.body:
They might meet certain specific stories with skepticism, but they would not deny the existence of magical beings.

I imagine everyone knows what the Shadow Isles are, even if everyone doesn't know who Hecarim or the Ruined King are.
